select t.*, u.user_name, u.birthday, u.telphone, tendencyAtta.atta_name, tendencyAtta.atta_path, userAtta.atta_name as user_atta_name, userAtta.atta_path as user_atta_path, d.content as discusses_content, discussUser.user_name as dicuss_user_name, discussAtta.atta_name as dicuss_user_atta_name, discussAtta.atta_path as dicuss_user_atta_path, zan.unid as zan_unid, zans.unid as zans_unid from t_tendency t left join t_user u on t.user_id = u.unid and u.status = '0' left join t_user_atta ua on u.unid = ua.user_unid and ua.status = 0 and ua.atta_type = '0' left join t_atta userAtta on ua.atta_unid = userAtta.unid and userAtta.status = '0' left join t_tendency_atta ta on t.unid = ta.tendency_id and ta.status = '0' left join t_atta tendencyAtta on ta.atta_id = tendencyAtta.unid and tendencyAtta.status = '0'
left join t_discuss d on t.unid = d.tendency_id and d.status = '0' left join t_user discussUser on d.user_id = discussUser.unid and discussUser.status = '0' left join t_user_atta discussUserAtta on discussUser.unid = discussUserAtta.user_unid and discussUserAtta.status = 0 and discussUserAtta.atta_type = '0' left join t_atta discussAtta on discussUserAtta.atta_unid = discussAtta.unid and discussUserAtta.status = '0' left join t_tendency_user_zan zan on zan.user_id = u.unid and zan.status = '0' left join t_tendency_user_zan zans on zans.tendency_id = t.unid and zan.status = '0'
and t.unid = #{unid} and t.user_id = #{userId} and t.group_id = #{groupId} and t.content = #{content} and t.status = #{status} and t.create_date = #{createDate}
order by t.create_date desc
